```{r xtable}
wine<-read.csv("wine_sample.csv", header=TRUE)
summary(wine[,-1])
attach(wine)

mytable <- table(quality) # A will be rows, B will be columns 


library(xtable)

result<-xtable(mytable)
print(result,type="html",comment=FALSE,scalebox = 0.7)

mytable

```
